thread.title: Nordstrom bosses criticized Trump before dropping Ivanka | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Nordstrom bosses criticized Trump before dropping Ivanka | Daily Mail Online

author: Chris Spargo For Dailymail.Com
title: Nordstrom bosses criticized Trump before dropping Ivanka | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Nordstrom bosses sent strongly worded memo criticizing President Trump's Muslim travel ban to all staff TWO days before dropping Ivanka's line Nordstrom announced that they would no longer be carrying Ivanka Trump's line of clothes and accessories last Thursday Two days prior the three co-presidents of the company sent an email to all staff criticizing President Trump's ban on immigrants from seven Muslim nations That letter stated how important immigrants were to the company, and stated that help would be offered should the ban impact any employees Co-presidents Peter, Erik, and Blake Nordstrom also noted that the company was founded by their great grandfather John, who was an immigrant On Thursday, Nordstrom announced that due to poor sales Ivanka's line would no longer be carried That decision came three weeks after Ivanka stepped down from her role with the company, and three months after the #GrabYourWallet boycott Published: 22:13 GMT, 6 February 2017 | Updated: 23:38 GMT, 6 February 2017 748 shares
